DOWRY_OFFENCES.2: Definition of dowry - Any property or valuable security given or agreed to be given in connection with marriage
DOWRY_OFFENCES.3: Penalty for giving or taking dowry - Imprisonment up to 5 years and fine up to Rs. 15,000
DOWRY_OFFENCES.4: Penalty for demanding dowry - Imprisonment from 6 months to 2 years and fine up to Rs. 10,000
DOWRY_OFFENCES.6: Dowry to be for the benefit of the wife or her heirs
DOWRY_OFFENCES.8: Offences to be cognizable, non-bailable and non-compoundable
